enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting and comparing error codes, which are central to the functionality of the ErrorCodeAttribute class.
The equals method compares the reason phrase, and setting it is a prerequisite for meaningful comparison.
The equals method compares the error class, making it necessary to retrieve this value before comparison.
The equals method compares the error number, making it necessary to retrieve this value before comparison.
The equals method compares the reason phrase, making it necessary to retrieve this value before comparison.
